info.title: Service Quotation (A2X)
info.description:
You can use this service to integrate external applications with service quotation processing in Service in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. In each API call, you can use the following operations:
 - Retrieve service quotations.
 - Create service quotations. Note: You must use “deep insert” requests (a header plus the following entities: header person responsible, header pricing element, header reference object, header text, and item).
 - Create new items for existing service quotations.
 - Create an item reference object, item pricing element, and an item text for existing service quotations items.
 - Update the header, header person responsible, header pricing element, header text, item, item pricing element, and item text of existing service quotations.
 - Delete the header person responsible, header reference object, header pricing element, header text, item, item reference object, item pricing element, and item text of existing service quotations.

x-sap-shortText: Manage service quotations with the data provided in a payload using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Service Order Management and Monitoring(3D2)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3D2 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Service Header (CRMS4_SERV_H)
* Service Item (CRMS4_SERV_I)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.summary: Accepts service quotations and creates the corresponding follow-up service orders.
post.description: Changes the status of the service quotations to 'Accepted' and creates the corresponding follow-up service orders.

parameters.name: ServiceQuotation
parameters.description:
Service Quotation  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SrvcQtanFUPServiceOrderType
parameters.description:
Transaction Type of Follow-Up Service Order  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ServiceQtanFUPSrvcOrd HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
